name: Cursed Device! [DEMO]
description:
Description (Directions):
Your just walking around normal at age "6," 'til you looked down and saw a broken phone device. You bent down and noticed that the phone you where looking at is your Cousin Anne's phone! You missed your Cousin when she died from a Coma that she 

couldn't escape from! ,':(  You also noticed that her phone was killed, because of her getting in a Car crash causing her to get in a Coma. So you checked if the phone was still alive, AND IT WAS! Soon you noticed that their was a glitching notification on

the phone, you pressed it and there was a game that popped up. the game was called: 
"Poison Enchantress." You remember that game you helped your Cousin Anne with it when you where "3"! You tapped on the start button, it took 1 min. to load because it was glitching and

kinda broken. Soon, it was finally finished until the game showed a little girl waving, she said hi and retold you the directions of the game, 'til there was more glitches skipping parts of the directions it faster, and Faster, and FAsTer! It showed the little girl filling up the whole screen of your Cousin's phone, making the phone shake, making the Light Bulbs shatter up. The little girl said that your Cousin Anne

ACTUALLY DID NOT CARE ABOUT YOU, and she broke her phone to curse it! Each time the girl spoke it made the furniture move. She came out of the phone and the game ends.

Hope you love the game and did not cry!!!!!1!!!
